text: Tulsa Roughnecks was a soccer club which played in North American Soccer League. At the time they were active, that was the top socccer league in U.S and Canada. ==League position== Season League Position 1978 NASL Playoff First round 1979 NASL Quarterfinal 1980 NASL Playoff First round 1981 NASL Playoff First round 1982 NASL Quarterfinal 1983 NASL Champions 1984 NASL 4th / West ==References== Category:Defunct American soccer teams
title: Tulsa Roughnecks
